content:
<repairs>
      UPD_NODE | (p) | {allergies: filter(x in p.allergies where x != 'oxycodone')}
      DEL_EDGE | [ra] | {node: (i), relationship: (p)-[ra]->(i)}
   </repairs>

This repair suggests updating the patient node to remove oxycodone from its allergies list and deleting the allergy edge between the patient and ingredient nodes. This way, the graph accurately represents that Logan497 is no longer allergic to oxycodone and can take the specified medication.
